korean: 새벽에 인스타 광고를 보다가 또 충동구매를 해버렸다.
잠이 안 와서 핸드폰을 보고 있었는데 광고가 자꾸 뜨더라고.
필요 없는 건 알지만 할인율이 너무 높아서 클릭하고 말았어.
알고 보니 원래 가격을 부풀려 놓은 것 같아.
내일 아침에 후회하겠지만 일단 결제는 완료됐다.
결제 완료 메시지 보고 나서야 정신이 들었어.
이번 달에도 충동구매를 너무 많이 한 것 같아.
새벽 광고가 진짜 사람 홀리는 마법이 있는 것 같아.
english: I ended up impulse buying again while scrolling through Instagram ads at dawn.
I couldn't sleep, so I was looking at my phone, and ads kept popping up.
I know I don't need it, but honestly, the discount was too good to pass up.
They said it was 70% off, so I fell for it.
Turns out the original price was probably inflated.
But it's pretty cute, so I bought it anyway.
I'll probably regret it tomorrow morning, but the payment is already done.
I came to my senses only after seeing the payment confirmation message.
But it was already too late.
I'm worried about next month's credit card bill.
I think I've made way too many impulse purchases this month.
I'm literally scared to look at my credit card statement.
From now on, I shouldn't look at my phone at dawn.
Dawn ads really seem to have some kind of magic that hypnotizes people.
